physical_appearance: "The title of this section is ""sepatah kata tentang pahatan-lino"" which translates to ""a word about lino-carvings"". It outlines the lino-carving procedure
subject_terms_1: and even has an illustration of the process. "
subject_terms_2: instructions (document genre) Apin, Mochtar  Instruction guide series Linoleum block-printing
